Revere.75 State Street: 75 State Street is a high-rise building located in the Financial District of Boston. The design architect was Gund Architects of Boston, in association with Skidmore, Owings and Merrill. The 31-story building rises to a height of 118.9 metres (390 ft), and has a floor area of 93,088 square metres (1,001,990 sq ft).
